snippet: The New York auction house Guernsey's explained on Thursday that all bidders in its planned winner-take-all auction of more than 5,500 artifacts salvaged from the wreckage of the Titanic must agree to abide by 19 pages' worth of court-ordered...
abstract: The New York auction house Guernsey's explained on Thursday that all bidders in its planned winner-take-all auction of more than 5,500 artifacts salvaged from the wreckage of the Titanic must agree to abide by 19 pages' worth of court-ordered covenants and commitments governing the collection.

headline.main: Responsible Bidders Sought for Titanic Auction
